short_summary: Open to qualified Electrical & Electronic Products Supply Arrangement Holders, National Capital Region
description: This requirement is open only to those Electrical & Electronic Products Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Stream two (2) for services in the National Capital Region for the following category:\
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Display Cables Supply

**Solicitation Number:** W3330-24-341

**Close Date:** November 30, 2023 at 14:00 EST

**AMP Invitation:** This requirement is open to Electrical & Electronic Products Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under Stream 2 for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the following UNSPSC category:

* Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories (32130000)

**Description of Work:** The Department of National Defence (DND) / Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) is seeking suppliers of display cables.

**Ineligibility Criteria:** Only Electrical & Electronic Products SA Holders who have qualified under Stream 2 are eligible to participate.

**Security Requirements:** There are no security requirements.

**Contracting Authority:**
Name: CIO Group
Email: IMBIDS.OFFRESGI@forces.gc.ca

**Submission Instructions:** Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to the qualified SA Holders. Bidders are advised to note that "Buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Submission must be made on behalf of an SA Holder who has been invited to participate in the tender process.
* Bidders must clearly indicate their SA Holder status and the corresponding SA number.
* Bidders must submit their RFP document in one of the official languages (English or French).

**Evaluation Criteria:** The procurement will be conducted through a Selective Tendering process. The Lowest Price will be the sole evaluation criteria.

Please be aware that an Amendment has been made to the original tender (Amendment 1). The Amendment Date is listed as November 30, 2023. The effective date of the amendment was on the same date.

**Important:**

* The tender is for the display cable supply only.
* A list of invited SA Holders can be requested from the Contracting Authority.
* Bidders who wish to submit a proposal must be a SA Holder in the Electrical & Electronic Products category with a Stream 2 qualification.

Please direct any inquiries to the Contracting Authority above. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

Note: Unsolicited suggestions from potential bidders are welcome. However, the DND/CAF will not engage in any negotiations with suppliers who are not part of the invited SA Holders list. Source
